spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a chance to stir the sac, releasing an egg which grants you 1,241 Intellect. Each egg hatches after 1 min, and the new brood attacks your next target, inflicting 105,896 Nature damage over 8 sec.
Equip: Your spells and abilities have a chance to let loose a nascent empowerment from the crystal, increasing a random secondary stat by 3,133 for 20 sec.
Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
